title: About
text:
Chengyang Gao, PhD
    PhD Student at University College London
    
    
      I am a researcher, educator, and data scientist with a passion for community-driven research. My research leverages computational methods to study the intersection of [your field] and [another field].
      
      My work focuses on developing innovative approaches to [specific focus area] while making science more accessible and collaborative.
